abstract.text: Get the latest updates for App Store Connect, including the new web UI for build delivery and enhancements to TestFlight notifications. We‚Äôll also discuss new app discovery features and enhancements, such as keywords for custom product pages, Accessibility Nutrition Labels, and age ratings updates. Additionally, learn about new functionalities like In-App Purchase offer codes and review summarization tools.

metadata.title: What‚Äôs new in App Store Connect

inlineContent.text: Be the hero to change that by watching the video and providing notes! It‚Äôs super easy:

abstract.text: Building on Background Assets, this session will introduce the new capability to download asset packs of content for games and other applications. Learn how Apple can host these asset packs for you or how to manage self-hosting options. We‚Äôll delve into the native API integration and the corresponding App Store implementations, providing you with the tools to enhance your app‚Äôs content delivery and user experience.

Explore the new monetization, subscription, and offer analytics coming to App Analytics. We‚Äôll cover how powerful, new data visualizations and automated reports can help you make data-driven decisions that drive revenue growth, and discuss how to pair these metrics with acquisition features such as custom product pages to optimize and improve your monetization strategy.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Optimize your monetization with App Analytics

abstract.text: Session notes shared by the community for the community.

Learn about the latest StoreKit API enhancements to help you deliver great In-App Purchase experiences to your customers. We‚Äôll review new fields added to AppTransaction, Transaction, and RenewalInfo, and updates to In-App Purchase offer codes. We‚Äôll also cover creating signed In-App Purchase requests using the App Store Server Library and updates to merchandising subscriptions using SwiftUI.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: What‚Äôs new in StoreKit and In-App Purchase
Evaluate your app for Accessibility Nutrition Labels

abstract.text: Use Accessibility Nutrition Labels on your App Store product page to highlight the accessibility features supported by your app. You‚Äôll learn how to evaluate your app‚Äôs accessibility features ‚Äî such as VoiceOver, Larger Text, Captions, and more ‚Äî and choose accurate and informative Accessibility Nutrition Labels. You‚Äôll also find out how to approach accessibility throughout the design phase.

Meet the Games app ‚Äì a new destination for players to keep up with what‚Äôs happening in their games, discover new ones, and play with friends, all in one place. Learn how to set up your game for optimal visibility in the Games app, integrate Game Center to enable social play, and keep players coming back with In-App Events.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Engage players with the Apple Games app
Automate your development process with the App Store Connect API

abstract.text: Learn how the new WebHook API can provide you with real-time notifications from App Store Connect. We‚Äôll also introduce new APls that can help you manage user feedback and build delivery, and discuss how to integrate these tools into your development workflow to improve efficiency and streamline your processes.

Learn how to engage customers with App Store Offers using App Store Connect, as well as the latest StoreKit features and APIs. Discover how you can set up win-back offers (a new way to re-engage previous subscribers) and generate offer codes for Mac apps. And find out how to test offers in sandbox and Xcode to make sure they work smoothly.
